name: Pinball Ruby & Sapphire

events.name: Register e-Reader Pokémon
events.longDesc: Simulate linking your Pokédex with a Pokédex where Chikorita, Cyndaquil, Totodile, and Aerodactyl have been caught.

guide: Obtain all possible 201 Pokémon using Pokémon Pinball R&S US.
To obtain Chikorita, Cyndaquil, Totodile, Aerodactyl:
-On Pokémon Pinball R&S JP, use the GET Special Guests Card e-Reader card to catch all 4 Pokémon.
-Link the Pokédex of Pokémon Pinball R&S JP and Pokémon Pinball R&S US.
-Catch all 4 Pokémon in Pokémon Pinball R&S US.
